#Text=Canada 's Don Valley West ( Ward 26 ) city council candidates speak
#Text=Friday , November 3 , 2006
#Text=On November 13 , Torontonians will be heading to the polls to vote for their ward 's councillor and for mayor .
#Text=Among Toronto 's ridings is Don Valley West ( Ward 26 ) .
#Text=Four candidates responded to Wikinews ' requests for an interview .

#Text=This ward 's candidates include Muhammad Alam , Bahar Aminvaziri , Orhan Aybars , Michele Carroll-Smith , Mohamed Dhanani , Abdul Ingar , Geoff Kettel , Debbie Lechter , Natalie Maniates , John Masterson , John Parker , David Thomas , Csaba Vegh , and Fred Williams .
#Text=For more information on the election , read Toronto municipal election , 2006 .
#Text=Geoff Kettel
#Text=58-year-old Geoff Kettel is a public administrator .
#Text=Q : Describe the three most important issues in your campaign .
#Text=A : Describe the three most important issues in your campaign .
#Text=Development in residential areas in Leaside and Bennington and Wynford/ Concorde
#Text=Public safety , tenant issues and property standards in Thorncliffe Park and Flemingdon Park
#Text=Future use of the Leaside industrial area
#Text=For other issues please go to the web site www . geoffkettel . ca
#Text=Q : What one election issue do you feel is most relevant to your ward in this election ?
#Text=A : The need to engage all communities and ensure fair representation of the whole ward .
#Text=I will work with the community to build a city that is safe , green and healthy , and responsibly manage the City 's finances
#Text=Q : Why have you chosen to involve yourself in the political process ?
#Text=A : I want to build a city that is safe , green and healthy and to responsibly manage the city 's finances .
#Text=The municipal councillor is in a unique position to effect positive change due to working at the order of government that is the closest to the citizens
#Text=I am qualified for the job having 25 years of community service in Ward 26 and 30 years of public service in the Ontario government .
#Text=My record of community service includes being :
#Text=Chair of the East York Board of Health and champion of the East York smoke free bylaws ;
#Text=Chair of a not for profit housing corporation which created 120 units of seniors housing in Leaside so folks could stay in the community they love ;
#Text=Chair of the Jenner Jean-Marie community centre in Thorncliffe Park and champion for its recently announced expansion to meet the needs of a growing community .
#Text=And in public service my record includes being Chief Financial Officer for Ontairo public health responsible for a $ 1 billion budget
#Text=Q : Why do you want to represent this particular ward on council ?
#Text=A : In my view it is essential that the councillor live in the Ward they represent .
#Text=I have lived in the Ward for 25 years .
#Text=As a result of living in and being involved in the community I am very knowledgeable about the Ward , its history , geography and economy etc.
